[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="meta-title"]]
Evelyn's Minecraft Skins
[[/div]]

Hello there! I'm [[*user snefrod]][[footnote]] Pronouns: She/Her [[/footnote]], or just Evelyn. I enjoy making representations of various SCP characters in the form of player skins for the video game //Minecraft//. 

All skins are designed for use with //Minecraft: Java Edition//, mostly using the slim arms player model. Skins using the wide arms model will be noted!

++ REDTAPE Series 

[[collapsible show="Robert Aram" hide="Close"]]
[[image bumaro.png]]
[[image Robert%20Aram.png]][[image Robert%20Bumaro.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Site-666 Personnel" hide="Close"]]
Note: Agent Calendar's skin uses the wide arms format.
[[image undervegas.png]]
[[image Randall%20House.png]][[image Agent%20Calendar.png]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="ROUNDERHOUSE's avatar" hide="Close"]]
This skin uses the wide arms format.
[[image yurtskin.png]]
[[image YURTSKIN.png]]
[[/collapsible]]
